content.label: So, I know this most likely won‚Äôt be seen, but I have to say this. I grew up with this game. I played it almost everyday while I was in the hospital. I spent my whole childhood there. I would like to go back to those days, and play this game. But it isn‚Äôt updated to be able to work with the type of phone I have. If I get lucky, I can find one of my older phones, but please, if this gets seen, please update it.
Great game

title.label: Please work on update or sequel

content.label: This game was so much fun. I will surely buy an update or sequel to this now that I‚Äôm back using an iPhone.

I love how unique this game is. I really like that there is no score, nor a right or wrong way to solve each puzzle. It allows the player to be creative while playing. It keeps my problem solving skills sharp! ;)

10 years later, I find myself thinking of this app! I hope you see this update and decide to update the app! I want to play it again! Thanks!!

This is my favorite mobile puzzle game of all time. Simple premise with fun challenging puzzles. I‚Äôd still be playing this game weekly if it were updated to work with the current iOS. I‚Äôd buy this game again if the dev brought it back. If you have an older iOS device, definitely download this one!
I had this on the first iPad and just bought my first iPhone... please update so I can download this on my phone!! I was so excited to find it again.
This was a great game.  It‚Äôs a shame it no longer works with newer iOS. Please update it.

The game is functional and had that time wasting capabilities that they all do. The puzzles are pleasantly engaging in the later levels, and I really wanted to give this 5 stars, but can not due to a (what I see as) a severe functionality but. When you get up to the later levels there is a glitch where after you finish a puzzle you cannot click ANY buttons. You have to restart the game and go back to the level selection screen to go to the next level. It really ruins my experience, and would love to see it fixed.

When can we expect an updated version for the latest iOS?

Thank you!
Please can you update it to IOS 11? I loved playing this game on my old iPod, but now that that‚Äôs gone I can‚Äôt play it.
It‚Äôs so much fun and I love it
Fun for the ipad1

I played trainyard on my moms iPad when I was very little like kindergarten little. I played the trainyard game and loved it. When I was older I bought trainyard express on my mini iPad. One day my iPad was on the couch and I had to use the restroom, I come back and my brother accidentally knocked it off the couch. It cracked and didn‚Äôt work as well. But I still could do trainyard express. One day it stops working for good. This past X-Mas I got a iPad on the IOS 11 and tried to get the game via iCloud, but it says it is not compatible. I‚Äôm very sad as I loved this game as it reminds me of when life was easy and calming. If this game is made to be compatible for IOS 11 I would be very happy. This is a great game and I rate it 5 stars if I had to do it on a ten point scale I would mark it at 9.97/10.00 for entertainment and fun. I also think it will be good for little kids who play on their parents devices since it encourages problem solving and mixing colors. And for kids who love trains like I did when I was little and I still like trains today. I personally think this game is one of the best games I‚Äôve ever played.

title.label: Is this ever going to be updated

content.label: I had this on my old phone and want to continue playing but it‚Äôs no longer available due to an update needing performed.  Come on, guys!
Please, please put this game compatible for iOS 11. This was a game part of my childhood, and I really wanna play it again, so please put it compatible for iOS 11!

I'm waiting to upgrade to iOS 11 until this comes out. :-)
I've not purchased it yet, but will the moment it's available!
Need supdate to iOS 11
After completing the level a without closing app just to tap on the next level.  Annoying!

I don‚Äôt know how long ‚Äúcoming soon‚Äù had been posted for the update before I saw it, but I‚Äôve been checking once/week for several months for the update. C‚Äômon now. Today is 02.20.18. iOS 11 has been out for quite a while now.
Please update
I updated my IPad to IOS11 and still It hadn‚Äôt updated. When will this be ready?
Very addictive but extremely fun games.
Genius design for simple to complex fun. Enjoyed for 7 years and will miss it immensely. Thanks Matt Rix! Update possible!?!
This app is not compatible with iOS 11 please update this app so I and many others can play again!

I enjoy the app since you have to use your noggin & not just mindlessly click away.
Love the engineer mode!

I purchased this game long ago. The trainyard Ex version and love the way it makes me think. 
Is this going to be updated for iOS 11??

title.label: Lots of fun but makes you think

content.label: I would have given this game 5 stars if I didn't have to close the game every time I complete a game.  Just as soon as all the trains enter their station the game freezes and won't let me go to the next level.  Once I close and reopen it will let me go to the next level.  Other than that glitch the game is a lot of fun and the tutorials are very good and explain everything.

Game seems great, but something broke recently (judging from review dates).  Cant get more than ~10 levels in before an empty white box appears over half the screen, with no controls, no way to get rid of it, and no way to continue the game. 
A shame. 

Don't bother until there's been an update.
A real boredom-buster.

I have been playing this game now a few days & all of a sudden every time I complete a puzzle, a white box covers most of the screen & I have to completely close the program. It was super fun up until it started doing this

I really enjoy the various complexities of this train traffic game from its merges, collisions, and crossovers to it painting and combining colors. This game is a neat little traffic puzzle game that requires some forethought and planning. 

I just wish they would fix the blank ad that you can't get rid of after you solve each puzzle - forcing you to restart the application. Would be a hell of a game then.
An engaging game for kids

This is a must have app.  I love logic and mind puzzles that is challenging and fun to do.  This is definitely one of them.  I hope the guy who invented this will invent a lot more puzzle apps. After I finish all sixty puzzles I will definitely get the ninety-nine cent version.
I used to play this all the time when I was a kid. It was fun back then, and it's just as fun now. I would recommend this game to everyone.

I bought the paid version thinking there would not be the same bug as the free version. After we solve a puzzle in the tutorial section, a white box appears in the upper left corner and everything freezes. 
What can fix that?
Really fun.  Not updated to current iOS though.

I LOVE logic games, and this one - Train Yard EX - doesn't disappoint! It starts out seeming very simple, and it is. The concepts are easy to grasp and the results satisfying. Then the levels of difficulty begin to increase until it gets downright hard - but in a good way!
The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I made it through the first five levels and was ready to start New Brunswick (6) when a large white rectangle popped up covering most of the screen! The problem is it's BLANK!

I'm assuming it's an ad, either for the $.99 level, or telling me I've completed all the free levels and it's time to move up to the $.99 level. 
What's frustrating is that I first just assumed random glitchy ad and deleted and reloaded the game thinking that might clear it. Then I stayed up until 2 am playing all 5 levels again only to have the same thing happen! Grrr!
Please fix this!!! It's the only thing keeping you from a 5 star rating!!

And for the record, I've already bought the $.99 level!

Okay, an edit/update is required... I just completed the $.99 game, and it did the very same thing.  So disappointing. Now I have to delete them both and I'm out the $.99.
I love this game so much and I wish there were more levels, worth your time to buy it
Love it

The game is amazing! Very difficult in later stages but that is to be expected. My one problem, which may be personal is whenever I get a correct solution a white box appears and the game freezes. I have to force close it and when I reopen it the top left corner has the bottom right of the game center app for a couple seconds and then vanishes. Someone please fix it!

I really like this game, but it puts a big white box on the screen and you can't do another thing. Sometimes for days. It's been there for three days now and I don't know if I will ever be able to play it again. Doesn't matter whether you have the free one or if you paid they both do the same thing.
Sad to see what was once such a great app become abandonware.

title.label: Really fun game, but one problem

content.label: The one problem is that on the screen that comes up after I solve a puzzle, I can't press any buttons. Other than that, really fun game!

title.label: Made by one guy in his spare time... PLEASE FIX

content.label: Very impressive for a single person's work. My dad developed his own app and I know how much time and effort it takes. I just completed the game after downloading it yesterday which is saying something because anyone who's played this game in the last-however-long knows that there's a very irritating glitch where the game freezes every time you complete a level-(please fix!).  Filled with complex and engaging puzzles, my boyfriend can't figure out how I do it or how it works at all. Thank you for this game, please fix the glitch.

Excellent game, as others have said: just the right level of challenge without getting terminally frustrated. My only concern is running out of levels. I just got this and I feel like I'm almost through it all. I will definitely get the paid version when I'm done with this, but I still don't know if that will be enough levels. Loving this game!

title.label: Awesome game, problems with it after you get into playing it alot

content.label: Big white box, appears to maybe be an AD, blocking screen after successfully completing a level. Very annoying. 5 stars if wasnt for the box. 1 star until its fixed.

Love it. Trainyard is my favorite app  Get it

My favorite thinking puzzle app! Not speed-related.
I stopped playing this game for a few years, but recently went back to it. Then I remembered why I stopped. There is a bug where the game freezes when a game is solved. When I checked the info in iTunes I discovered there is a fix for that! Go to credits and click Rate It. No need to actually rate it, tho. Now it's working again and I can enjoy playing.
Awesome game!
I love this game. Not only do I love trains, but I love puzzles and this game combines my two loves. The game is challenging too. Kudos to the developers.

title.label: Read that submitting a review fixes the forced restart

content.label:
...so I'm giving it a try.

Edit: Yep, that does it. No problems now. But...I don't like being forced to rate or write a review. Otherwise, it would have gotten 5 stars.
Can't use next and previous buttons after completing levels starting around Ontario. Would purchase if fixed.
